1045420.name: Fantasy Grounds - Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Tavern Multi-Pack (Map Pack)
1045420.description:
Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Tavern Multi-Pack

Time to Party!
Is that treasure hoard burning holes in the heroes' pockets?
Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Tavern Multi-Packhas you covered. The four sides of this Flip-Mat Multi-Pack present a unique tavern experience. From roadhouse and gambling hall to pirate bar and metropolitan watering hole, each side allows your players to party the night away! With these handy tavern maps, you'll be ready for anything the next time your players are looking for a new group of drinking buddies!
This set includes two Flip-Mats usable by experienced GMs and novices alike,
Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Tavern Multi-Packfits perfectly into any Game Master's arsenal!
This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and features the following additions:
  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: David Middleton
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
